source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

#Create DataFrame for the dbopeoplebasic MD Table
dbopeoplebasic = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbopeoplebasic.parquet', format='parquet')
dbopeoplebasic.createOrReplaceTempView("dbopeoplebasic")

#Create DataFrame for the dbopeopledriver MD Table
dbopeopledriver = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbopeopledriver.parquet', format='parquet')
dbopeopledriver.createOrReplaceTempView("dbopeopledriver")

#Create DataFrame for the dbopeoplepersonal MD Table
dbopeoplepersonal = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbopeoplepersonal.parquet', format='parquet')
dbopeoplepersonal.createOrReplaceTempView("dbopeoplepersonal")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehiclebasic MD Table
dbovehiclebasic = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbovehiclebasic.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehiclebasic.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehiclebasic")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehicleadmin MD Table
dbovehicleadmin = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbovehicleadmin.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehicleadmin.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehicleadmin")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehicleoperations MD Table
dbovehicleoperations = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbovehicleoperations.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehicleoperations.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehicleoperations")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehiclefinance MD Table
dbovehiclefinance = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbovehiclefinance.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehiclefinance.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehiclefinance")

#Create DataFrame for the dbovehicletracking MD Table
dbovehicletracking = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbovehicletracking.parquet', format='parquet')
dbovehicletracking.createOrReplaceTempView("dbovehicletracking")
